mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT(SUBSTR(B.NEW_PPC_ID, 1, 11), LPAD( (SUBSTR(B.NEW_PPC_ID, 12, 5)) + 1 , 5, '0')) , CONCAT('PPC', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '00001') ) AS NEW_PPC_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.PPC_ID) AS NEW_PPC_ID FROM PRO1102 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PPC_ID LIKE CONCAT('PPC', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') ) B

SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT(SUBSTR(B.NEW_STO_ID, 1, 11), LPAD( (SUBSTR(B.NEW_STO_ID, 12, 5)) + 1 , 5, '0')) , CONCAT('STO', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '00001') ) AS NEW_STO_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.STO_ID) AS NEW_STO_ID FROM PRO1103 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.STO_ID LIKE CONCAT('STO', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') ) B

SELECT C.ENT_ID, C.PPC_ID, A.PROD_ID, A.PROD_NM, A.GUBUN, B.ITEM_ID, B.ITEM_NM, A.PROD_SUP_YN, A.PROD_PAY_CODE, SUM(CASE WHEN STATE_CD='01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS QUANTITY, SUM(CASE WHEN (STATE_CD='02' OR STATE_CD='07' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ORDER_QUANTITY FROM PRO1100 A JOIN PRO1000 B ON A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID JOIN PRO1102 C ON C.PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' JOIN PRO1103 D ON D.PPC_ID = C.PPC_ID AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.ENT_ID = #{entId} AND A.PROD_NM like concat('%',#{prodNm},'%') AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND A.PROD_PAY_CODE = #{prodPayCode} AND A.GUBUN = #{gubun} AND A.TAX_INFO_CD = #{taxInfoCd} GROUP BY A.PROD_ID ORDER BY A.REG_DTM, PROD_BAR_NUM ASC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT D.STO_ID, C.PPC_ID, A.PROD_ID, A.PROD_NM, A.GUBUN, A.PROD_OFL_PRICE, A.PROD_SUP_PRICE, A.RENTAL_PRICE, A.RENTAL_PRICE_EXTN, B.ITEM_ID, B.ITEM_NM, A.PROD_SUP_YN, A.PROD_PAY_CODE, D.PROD_COLOR, D.PROD_SIZE, D.PROD_OPTION, D.PROD_BAR_NUM, D.INITIAL_CONTRACT_DATE FROM PRO1100 A JOIN PRO1000 B ON A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID JOIN PRO1102 C ON C.PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' JOIN PRO1103 D ON D.PPC_ID = C.PPC_ID AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.STATE_CD = '01' AND D.PROD_BAR_NUM = #{prodBarNum} AND D.PROD_COLOR = #{prodColor} AND D.PROD_SIZE = #{prodSize} AND D.PROD_OPTION = #{prodOption} AND D.REG_USR_ID = #{usrId} AND D.STO_ID = #{stoId} AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND A.GUBUN = #{gubun} AND C.ENT_ID = #{entId} ORDER BY D.REG_DTM, PROD_BAR_NUM ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PRO1103 WHERE STO_ID in#{item}
